channel.title: Alot of cleaned oss releases?
channel.description: Hey all, I noticed that there are a lot of cleaned delta's and stuff are in progress or released. Which is pretty funny since every thread says they are like pissed about the rsps looking like the new rs. Anyways i was wondering why everyone makes this old school servers?

item.title: Alot of cleaned oss releases?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:3, topic:476380”]I don’t mind 317’s loading higher revision data, its just more about the way its done. When some people (people that don’t know jack shit about what their doing) attempt it, its hardcoded, sloppy, and totally unnecessary because if they want a complete 508+ server they can USE AN ACTUAL 508 CLIENT AND SERVER.

People who are making these ‘old school servers’ are just sticking to the era the server and client were meant to be in.[/quote]It’s harder to write a newer server from scratch and implement everything a 317 server has than it is to take a 317 client and implement all the content a newer cache has.

Read full topic

item.title: Alot of cleaned oss releases?
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

What’s the point in Developing a 317-based (most are really 319 but oh well) Revision, if you’re just going to stick 562+ Revision Content into it? You should be Developing a 562 if you want 562 Content.

[b]/Thread

Read full topic

item.title: Alot of cleaned oss releases?
item.dc:creator: @enzo42 enzo42
item.description:
@enzo42 wrote:

If you are going to use a 317 server, don’t add new content on it.
It’s that easy.
Adding new stuff in it results in making it look like a piece of shit.

Read full topic
